title: Experience Microsoft Developer Required for Long-term Engagement
description: We are at the forefront of leveraging Microsoft Cloud solutions to empower organisations towards enhanced productivity, collaboration, and security. Based in Australia and extending our services globally, we specialise in Microsoft 365, Azure Cloud, and Power Platform solutions. We are committed to growing our company ethically, positively, and with a sense of enjoyment. Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced Senior Microsoft Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be a versatile full-stack developer with a deep understanding of Microsoft products, including Power Platform and Azure DevOps. Your expertise in API integration and .NET applications will play a pivotal role in developing and enhancing our solutions, ensuring we stay ahead in delivering top-tier services to our clients. Key Responsibilities: - Develop and implement solutions based on Microsoft Cloud technologies, focusing on Power Platform and Azure DevOps. - Lead the integration of various APIs to enhance and automate business processes. - Design, develop, and maintain .NET applications, ensuring high performance and responsiveness. - Collaborate with project teams to identify, design, and deploy innovative solutions meeting business requirements. - Provide technical leadership, mentoring junior developers, and contributing to the team's knowledge sharing. Essential Skills and Qualifications: - Proven experience as a full-stack developer with extensive knowledge of Microsoft technologies. - Strong background in API integration, with the ability to design and implement complex systems. - Expertise in .NET and .NET applications development. - Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. - Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Desirable Skills: - Familiarity with cloud security practices. - Experience with front-end technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript) for creating seamless user experiences. - Knowledge of Agile methodologies and DevOps practices. - Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English. - Fluency in Filipino is a plus, enhancing collaboration within our diverse team. Cultural Requirements: - Ability to work remotely with a high degree of self-motivation and discipline. - Strong interpersonal skills, with an emphasis on teamwork, initiative, and integrity. - A positive attitude towards continuous learning and personal development. What We Offer: - A vibrant, ethical, and collaborative working environment. - Opportunities for professional growth and development.
